service_figures: INT has over 27 years of experience in delivering CRM solutions, having worked with more than 500 clients and completed over 11,000 client projects. The company specializes in automating sales processes and enhancing CRM adoption through structured strategies. INT's dedicated Zoho practice consists of 15-20 professionals, including 4-5 certified Zoho CRM developers, ensuring specialized expertise in CRM delivery. Their approach includes comprehensive assessments, streamlined implementations, and ongoing support to optimize CRM performance and drive revenue growth.
